title: `Quarkus-cli create app`  change default extensions on upstreams
body:
### Describe the bug

`quarkus create app` creates an application with `quarkus-resteasy` as a default extension on Quarkus 2.7.5
The same statement with Quarkus Upstream (`999-SNAPSHOT`), add as a default extension `quarkus-resteasy-reactive`. 

I am not sure if this change is intended or was something leftover. 

Summary: 

Quarkus-cli `999-SNAPSHOT`, default RestEasy Extension -> `quarkus-resteasy-reactive`
Quarkus-cli `2.7.5.Final`, default RestEasy Extension -> `quarkus-resteasy`
